Your love for that which is human is to be secondary to your love for God. The wealth of your affection is to flow forth to Him who gave His life for you. Living for God, the soul sends forth to Him its best and highest affections. Is the greatest outflow of your love toward 

426 

Him who died for you? If it is, your love for each other will be after heaven's order.--7T 45, 46 (1902).
